body:
If the only way you'll listen to the truth is if I whisper it in your ear while gently jerking you off, you dont give a shit about the truth.

I tried being [polite](https://ruqqus.com/post/178k/i-would-like-to-know-why) and [this](https://ruqqus.com/post/17x3/the-response-i-got-when-i) is the response I got, followed by that pack of shitty lies in the "free speech and censorship" thread, so now I'm done with that and I'm calling them fucking liars.

If you want to go give them a handjob for lying politely, go make it happen.

body:
Your ignorance prevents you from understanding you are stepping over your own toes, but if you had read my original reply to you thoroughly you would have understood that.

Nobody is interested in listening to the racist rants of a frustrated troll who spreads nothing but toxicity about the platform where he's posting, other racial groups, or the users who criticize him.

When the idiots of Antifa blame 'the whites' for their problem and justify violence and discrimination against any opposition, we see the error of their logic, but when you do it everything's ok, right? You must *obviously* be right and everyone else is wrong. Don't you understand you're just opposite sides of the same idiot-coin? Present a logical, civil argument and people will listen. If you're going to be a troll twat who intends to carry out stuff like this, and I quote...
>"Anyway I'll just make this thread every couple of days until the High Lord Jannies make up a bullshit reason to lie to you about banning me, too."

...nobody is going to care what you have to say.

Your mind is poisoned by the very system you're trying to fight against, and your hostile ranting isn't ever going to help you convince anyone of your cause.
body_html:
Your ignorance prevents you from understanding you are stepping over your own toes, but if you had read my original reply to you thoroughly you would have understood that.

Nobody is interested in listening to the racist rants of a frustrated troll who spreads nothing but toxicity about the platform where he's posting, other racial groups, or the users who criticize him.

When the idiots of Antifa blame 'the whites' for their problem and justify violence and discrimination against any opposition, we see the error of their logic, but when you do it everything's ok, right? You must obviously be right and everyone else is wrong. Don't you understand you're just opposite sides of the same idiot-coin? Present a logical, civil argument and people will listen. If you're going to be a troll twat who intends to carry out stuff like this, and I quote...

"Anyway I'll just make this thread every couple of days until the High Lord Jannies make up a bullshit reason to lie to you about banning me, too."

...nobody is going to care what you have to say.

Your mind is poisoned by the very system you're trying to fight against, and your hostile ranting isn't ever going to help you convince anyone of your cause.

I'm unaware of any details besides seeing your responses on discord, so I've come to that conclusion. On your original post a lot of people agreed with you, sure a few called you a shill and what not but it doesn't incite that we're all for censorship. I'm trying to understand your position so help me do so.

I believe there is some miscommunication happening currently, I'm for one interested to see the admins answering these questions truthfully.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Unfortunately I think the admins are already starting down the slippery slope, so some things are no longer open to discussion for those who aren't either mods of the discord or part of the selected "focus group" that tests all the new features and gives feedback. That's probably why they're not giving us answers anymore, because they now view anyone outside of those two groups as having no right talk to them about it.

I'll emphasize again, the people who were chosen for these roles should take no responsibility for this. This is only on the admins for having a poor selection process.

body:
“No one understands that the First Amendment is only important if you are going to offend somebody. If you're not going to offend somebody, you don't need protection of the First Amendment.”
-- Larry Flynt

Bookmarked and observing.  I may not agree with the view, but I'll be the judge of what I choose to read or not read.
body_html:
“No one understands that the First Amendment is only important if you are going to offend somebody. If you're not going to offend somebody, you don't need protection of the First Amendment.” -- Larry Flynt

Bookmarked and observing. I may not agree with the view, but I'll be the judge of what I choose to read or not read.

parent.body:
Unfortunately I think the admins are already starting down the slippery slope, so some things are no longer open to discussion for those who aren't either mods of the discord or part of the selected "focus group" that tests all the new features and gives feedback. That's probably why they're not giving us answers anymore, because they now view anyone outside of those two groups as having no right talk to them about it.

I'll emphasize again, the people who were chosen for these roles should take no responsibility for this. This is only on the admins for having a poor selection process.

body:
i find it comical people want an extreme free speech social media on the surface web.

the way i understood what ruqqus is aiming to do is be a political ideology censorship free space and not a space people can sling racial slurs and bigotry.

if you want a 100% free speech no hold bars arena, the deep web is the place your going to find it.

i checked out voat before i heard of ruqqus and spent 15 mins and noped the fuck out with all the racial slurs i seen.
people like me have 0 interest being in a place we see racial slurs thrown around like christmas lights.

sometimes you need accept a place doesnt fit your ideology and move on instead of throwing a hissy fit about why it doesnt fit to what you want.

parent.body:
Your ignorance prevents you from understanding you are stepping over your own toes, but if you had read my original reply to you thoroughly you would have understood that.

Nobody is interested in listening to the racist rants of a frustrated troll who spreads nothing but toxicity about the platform where he's posting, other racial groups, or the users who criticize him.

When the idiots of Antifa blame 'the whites' for their problem and justify violence and discrimination against any opposition, we see the error of their logic, but when you do it everything's ok, right? You must *obviously* be right and everyone else is wrong. Don't you understand you're just opposite sides of the same idiot-coin? Present a logical, civil argument and people will listen. If you're going to be a troll twat who intends to carry out stuff like this, and I quote...
>"Anyway I'll just make this thread every couple of days until the High Lord Jannies make up a bullshit reason to lie to you about banning me, too."

...nobody is going to care what you have to say.

Your mind is poisoned by the very system you're trying to fight against, and your hostile ranting isn't ever going to help you convince anyone of your cause.

When the idiots of Antifa blame 'the whites' for their problem and justify violence and discrimination against any opposition, we see the error of their logic, but when you do it everything's ok, right? You must obviously be right and everyone else is wrong. Don't you understand you're just opposite sides of the same idiot-coin? Present a logical, civil argument and people will listen. If you're going to be a troll twat who intends to carry out stuff like this, and I quote...

"Anyway I'll just make this thread every couple of days until the High Lord Jannies make up a bullshit reason to lie to you about banning me, too."

...nobody is going to care what you have to say.

Your mind is poisoned by the very system you're trying to fight against, and your hostile ranting isn't ever going to help you convince anyone of your cause.

post.title: While you excellent people are charting the ignoble decline of Reddit, the High Lord Jannies of Ruqqus are hard at work banning people and deleting posts with no record, explanation or accountability of any kind, while the yes men on their discord make jokes about "freeze peach" and call anyone who complains a redditor!

body:
OP is a fucking shithead but he does have a point. An offensive word is just a word. No matter who it is supposed to offend, the fact that he uses it only reveals the flaws in his character. Offense is taken. So, admins, stop being fucking pussies about this. I had some hopes for ruqqus but yeah, this makes no logical sense.

Supposedly, this site protects what the first amendment does and it is breaking that promise so early? Damn. And this is coming from a black man myself.
